name: Joomla
author: Andrew Horton, Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>, @anozoozian
description: Opensource CMS written in PHP. Aggressive version detection compares just 5 files, checks for version 1.0.0 up to 3.6.4

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<meta name="Generator" content="Joomla! - Copyright \(C\) 200[0-9] - 200[0-9] Open Source Matters. All rights reserved." \/>)
(?-mix:<meta name="generator" content="Joomla! (\d\.\d) - Open Source Content Management" \/>)
